sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: When a variable, constant, type or subprogram is declared, you can specify that it is to be pervasive, which means that it does not need to be explicitly imported into modules, monitors or classes in the current scope. The keyword pervasive can be abbreviated as an asterisk (*).
sections.mdown_content: When a variable, constant, type or subprogram is declared, you can specify that it is to be **pervasive**, which means that it does not need to be explicitly imported into modules, monitors or classes in the current scope. The keyword **pervasive** can be abbreviated as an asterisk (*).
